channel.title: CVE Feed for zephyrproject-rtos -- Zephyr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for zephyrproject-rtos -- Zephyr

item.title: CVE-2021-3329|2024-08-03T16:53:17.491Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Lack of proper validation in HCI Host stack initialization can cause a crash of the bluetooth stack

item.title: CVE-2021-3835|2024-08-03T17:09:09.528Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Buffer overflow in usb device class. Zephyr versions >= v2.6.0 contain Heap-based Buffer Overflow (CWE-122). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-fm6v-8625-99jf

item.title: CVE-2021-3430|2024-08-03T16:53:17.875Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Assertion reachable with repeated LL_CONNECTION_PARAM_REQ. Zephyr versions >= v1.14 contain Reachable Assertion (CWE-617). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-46h3-hjcq-2jjr

item.title: CVE-2021-3320|2024-08-03T16:53:17.134Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Type Confusion in 802154 ACK Frames Handling. Zephyr versions >= v2.4.0 contain NULL Pointer Dereference (CWE-476). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-27r3-rxch-2hm7

item.title: CVE-2021-3330|2024-08-03T16:53:17.537Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: RCE/DOS: Linked-list corruption leading to large out-of-bounds write while sorting for forged fragment list in Zephyr. Zephyr versions >= >=2.4.0 contain Out-of-bounds Write (CWE-787). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-fj4r-373f-9456

item.title: CVE-2021-3435|2024-08-03T16:53:17.621Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Information leakage in le_ecred_conn_req(). Zephyr versions >= v2.4.0 Use of Uninitialized Resource (CWE-908). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-xhg3-gvj6-4rqh

item.title: CVE-2021-3436|2024-08-03T16:53:17.616Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: BT: Possible to overwrite an existing bond during keys distribution phase when the identity address of the bond is known. Zephyr versions >= 1.14.2, >= 2.4.0, >= 2.5.0 contain Use of Multiple Resources with Duplicate Identifier (CWE-694). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-j76f-35mc-4h63

item.title: CVE-2021-3432|2024-08-03T16:53:17.549Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Invalid interval in CONNECT_IND leads to Division by Zero. Zephyr versions >= v1.14.0 Divide By Zero (CWE-369). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-7364-p4wc-8mj4

item.title: CVE-2021-3319|2024-08-03T16:53:17.477Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: DOS: Incorrect 802154 Frame Validation for Omitted Source / Dest Addresses. Zephyr versions >= > v2.4.0 contain NULL Pointer Dereference (CWE-476), Attempt to Access Child of a Non-structure Pointer (CWE-588). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-94jg-2p6q-5364

item.title: CVE-2021-3431|2024-08-03T16:53:17.507Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Assertion reachable with repeated LL_FEATURE_REQ. Zephyr versions >= v2.5.0 contain Reachable Assertion (CWE-617). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-7548-5m6f-mqv9

item.title: CVE-2021-3861|2024-08-03T17:09:09.588Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: The RNDIS USB device class includes a buffer overflow vulnerability. Zephyr versions >= v2.6.0 contain Heap-based Buffer Overflow (CWE-122). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-hvfp-w4h8-gxvj

item.title: CVE-2021-3454|2024-08-03T16:53:17.591Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Truncated L2CAP K-frame causes assertion failure. Zephyr versions >= 2.4.0, >= v.2.50 contain Improper Handling of Length Parameter Inconsistency (CWE-130), Reachable Assertion (CWE-617). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-fx88-6c29-vrp3

item.title: CVE-2021-3581|2024-08-03T17:01:07.347Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Buffer Access with Incorrect Length Value in zephyr. Zephyr versions >= >=2.5.0 contain Buffer Access with Incorrect Length Value (CWE-805). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-8q65-5gqf-fmw5

item.title: CVE-2022-3806|2024-08-03T01:20:58.382Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Inconsistent handling of error cases in bluetooth hci may lead to a double free condition of a network buffer.

item.title: CVE-2021-3966|2024-08-03T17:09:09.756Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: usb device bluetooth class includes a buffer overflow related to implementation of net_buf_add_mem.

item.title: CVE-2021-3321|2024-08-03T16:53:17.472Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Integer Underflow in Zephyr in IEEE 802154 Fragment Reassembly Header Removal. Zephyr versions >= >=2.4.0 contain Integer Overflow to Buffer Overflow (CWE-680). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-w44j-66g7-xw99

item.title: CVE-2022-2993|2024-08-03T00:52:59.943Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: There is an error in the condition of the last if-statement in the function smp_check_keys. It was rejecting current keys if all requirements were unmet.

item.title: CVE-2021-3510|2024-08-03T16:53:17.841Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Zephyr JSON decoder incorrectly decodes array of array. Zephyr versions >= >1.14.0, >= >2.5.0 contain Attempt to Access Child of a Non-structure Pointer (CWE-588). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-289f-7mw3-2qf4

item.title: CVE-2021-3455|2024-08-03T16:53:17.699Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Disconnecting L2CAP channel right after invalid ATT request leads freeze. Zephyr versions >= 2.4.0, >= 2.5.0 contain Use After Free (CWE-416). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-7g38-3x9v-v7vp

item.title: CVE-2021-3433|2024-08-03T16:53:17.846Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Invalid channel map in CONNECT_IND results to Deadlock. Zephyr versions >= v2.5.0 Improper Check or Handling of Exceptional Conditions (CWE-703). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-3c2f-w4v6-qxrp

item.title: CVE-2022-2741|2024-08-03T00:46:04.174Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: The denial-of-service can be triggered by transmitting a carefully crafted CAN frame on the same CAN network as the vulnerable node. The frame must have a CAN ID matching an installed filter in the vulnerable node (this can easily be guessed based on CAN traffic analyses). The frame must contain the opposite RTR bit as what the filter installed in the vulnerable node contains (if the filter matches RTR frames, the frame must be a data frame or vice versa).

item.title: CVE-2021-3434|2024-08-03T16:53:17.527Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Stack based buffer overflow in le_ecred_conn_req(). Zephyr versions >= v2.5.0 Stack-based Buffer Overflow (CWE-121). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-8w87-6rfp-cfrm

item.title: CVE-2021-3323|2024-08-03T16:53:17.515Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Integer Underflow in 6LoWPAN IPHC Header Uncompression in Zephyr. Zephyr versions >= >=2.4.0 contain Integer Underflow (Wrap or Wraparound) (CWE-191). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-89j6-qpxf-pfpc

item.title: CVE-2021-3625|2024-08-03T17:01:07.411Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Buffer overflow in Zephyr USB DFU DNLOAD. Zephyr versions >= v2.5.0 contain Heap-based Buffer Overflow (CWE-122). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-c3gr-hgvr-f363

item.title: CVE-2022-1841|2024-08-03T00:17:00.805Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: In subsys/net/ip/tcp.c , function tcp_flags , when the incoming parameter flags is ECN or CWR , the buf will out-of-bounds write a byte zero.

item.title: CVE-2021-3322|2024-08-03T16:53:17.355Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Unexpected Pointer Aliasing in IEEE 802154 Fragment Reassembly in Zephyr. Zephyr versions >= >=2.4.0 contain NULL Pointer Dereference (CWE-476). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-p86r-gc4r-4mq3

item.title: CVE-2023-6749|2024-08-02T08:42:07.169Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Unchecked length coming from user input in settings shell

item.title: CVE-2023-6249|2024-08-02T08:21:18.165Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Signed to unsigned conversion esp32_ipm_send

item.title: CVE-2023-7060|2024-08-02T08:50:07.968Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Zephyr OS IP packet handling does not properly drop IP packets arriving on an external interface with a source address equal to 127.0.01 or the destination address.

item.title: CVE-2023-5779|2024-08-02T08:07:32.855Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: can: out of bounds in remove_rx_filter function

item.title: CVE-2023-6881|2024-08-02T08:42:08.232Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Possible buffer overflow in is_mount_point

item.title: CVE-2024-3332|2024-08-01T20:05:08.484Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: A malicious BLE device can send a specific order of packet sequence to cause a DoS attack on the victim BLE device

item.title: CVE-2024-1638|2024-08-01T18:48:21.828Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: The documentation specifies that the BT_GATT_PERM_READ_LESC and BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_LESC defines for a Bluetooth characteristic: Attribute read/write permission with LE Secure Connection encryption. If set, requires that LE Secure Connections is used for read/write access, however this is only true when it is combined with other permissions, namely BT_GATT_PERM_READ_ENCRYPT/BT_GATT_PERM_READ_AUTHEN (for read) or BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_ENCRYPT/BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_AUTHEN (for write), if these additional permissions are not set (even in secure connections only mode) then the stack does not perform any permission checks on these characteristics and they can be freely written/read.

item.title: CVE-2023-6749|2024-07-26T15:24:08.412Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Unchecked length coming from user input in settings shell

item.title: CVE-2024-3332|2024-07-03T18:00:13.536Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: A malicious BLE device can send a specific order of packet sequence to cause a DoS attack on the victim BLE device

item.title: CVE-2023-5779|2024-02-18T07:46:41.927Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: can: out of bounds in remove_rx_filter function

item.title: CVE-2023-7060|2024-06-04T17:17:29.040Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: Zephyr OS IP packet handling does not properly drop IP packets arriving on an external interface with a source address equal to 127.0.01 or the destination address.

item.description: Unchecked length coming from user input in settings shell

item.description: Signed to unsigned conversion esp32_ipm_send

item.description: Possible buffer overflow in is_mount_point

item.title: CVE-2024-1638|2024-02-19T21:19:51.915Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: The documentation specifies that the BT_GATT_PERM_READ_LESC and BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_LESC defines for a Bluetooth characteristic: Attribute read/write permission with LE Secure Connection encryption. If set, requires that LE Secure Connections is used for read/write access, however this is only true when it is combined with other permissions, namely BT_GATT_PERM_READ_ENCRYPT/BT_GATT_PERM_READ_AUTHEN (for read) or BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_ENCRYPT/BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_AUTHEN (for write), if these additional permissions are not set (even in secure connections only mode) then the stack does not perform any permission checks on these characteristics and they can be freely written/read.

item.title: CVE-2024-3077|2024-06-04T17:31:38.524Z -- zephyrproject-rtos -- zephyr
item.description: An malicious BLE device can crash BLE victim device by sending malformed gatt packet

item.description: A malicious BLE device can send a specific order of packet sequence to cause a DoS attack on the victim BLE device

item.description: Signed to unsigned conversion esp32_ipm_send

item.description: The documentation specifies that the BT_GATT_PERM_READ_LESC and BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_LESC defines for a Bluetooth characteristic: Attribute read/write permission with LE Secure Connection encryption. If set, requires that LE Secure Connections is used for read/write access, however this is only true when it is combined with other permissions, namely BT_GATT_PERM_READ_ENCRYPT/BT_GATT_PERM_READ_AUTHEN (for read) or BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_ENCRYPT/BT_GATT_PERM_WRITE_AUTHEN (for write), if these additional permissions are not set (even in secure connections only mode) then the stack does not perform any permission checks on these characteristics and they can be freely written/read.
